text: Pes az tu ej Rasul, ʙisjor pajomʙarone ʙa sui qavmason firistodaem, to onhoro da'vat namojand va ʙar ozori onho saʙru toqat kunand. Az onho dostoni ʙa'zero ʙarojat guftaem va dostoni ʙa'zero naguftaem. Va hama pajomʙaron amr suda ʙudand, ki vahji ilohiro ʙa qavmason ʙirasonand. Va hec pajomʙarero nasazad, ki mu'cizae ʙijovarad, magar ʙa farmoni Alloh. Va cun farmoni Alloh ʙaroi azoʙi takziʙkunandagon darrasad, mijoni pajomʙaron va duruƣʙarovardagonason ʙarhaq dovari gardad va onon, ki ʙar ʙotil ʙudaand, on co zijon xohand did
